On the right side of the street, there's a building with a gray facade, standing tall amidst the greenery. Its presence adds a touch of urban architecture to the scene. On the left side of the street, there's a white fence running parallel to the road, perhaps marking the boundary of a property or a park.

Overall, the image captures a typical day in Beijing, with its blend of urban development and natural beauty.
